item.title: Dot plot challenge: Gender gap in voting in general elections in Europe
item.description: Getting and reshaping the data The Dot Plot Responding to the Storytelling with Data challenge #SWDchallenge, whose August edition stars the dot plot, here is a simple plot of the gender gap in voting in national elections using the most recent 8th Round of the European Social Survey, ESS. Getting and reshaping the data library(essurvey) # getting European Social Survey data library(tidyverse) # data cleaning and reshaping library(countrycode) # switching between country codes library(ggplot2) # plots With the essurvey package the ESS data can be downloaded directly to R, while thanks to the tidyverse data manipulation boils down to a single block of code.
